name: Clean'Em Up (itch)
description:
Clean’Em Up is a PC Top Down Shooter with neon graphics and enormous number of on screen enemies. You play as an Upgradable Antivirus; you seek and destroy viruses, collect and protect files and face huge Bosses.

The story is simple: Your Computer has been hacked...It's now under attack... Dozens of viruses and other threats have penetrated your System... Files have been infected...Sectors have been damaged... The Security Army is your last hope to regain order throughout your system.
